mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Potomac Elementary School Grade 3 Class of 1964
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Potomac Elementary School class of 1964, grade 3. Lucy Moore, Congressman Moore's youngest daughter, is in the front row, first on the right.
